00182 extern time_t          ServerBootTime ;
00183 extern nfs_parameter_t nfs_param ;
00184 
00185   
00198 int nfs4_FhandleToFSAL( nfs_fh4 * pfh4, fsal_handle_t * pfsalhandle, fsal_op_context_t * pcontext ) 
00199 {
00200   fsal_status_t      fsal_status ;
00201   file_handle_v4_t * pfile_handle ;
00202   unsigned long long checksum ;
00203   
00204 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00205    print_fhandle4( *pfh4 ) ;
00206 #endif
00207 
00208   /* Verify the len */
00209   if( pfh4->nfs_fh4_len !=  sizeof( file_handle_v4_t ) )
00210     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00211 
00212   /* Cast the fh as a non opaque structure */
00213   pfile_handle = (file_handle_v4_t *)(pfh4->nfs_fh4_val) ;
00214 
00215   /* Check the cksum */
00216   memcpy( (char *)&checksum, &(pfile_handle->checksum), sizeof( checksum ) ) ;
00217   if( checksum != nfs4_FhandleCheckSum( pfile_handle ) )
00218     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00219 
00220   /* The filehandle should not be related to pseudo fs */
00221   if( pfile_handle->pseudofs_id != 0 ||  pfile_handle->pseudofs_flag != FALSE )
00222     return 0 ; /* Bad FH */
00223 
00224   /* Fill in the fs opaque part */
00225   fsal_status = FSAL_ExpandHandle( pcontext->export_context, FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV4,  (caddr_t)&(pfile_handle->fsopaque), pfsalhandle ) ;
00226   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00227     return 0 ; /* Corrupted (or stale) FH */
00228 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00229   print_buff( (char *)pfsalhandle, sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) ) ;
00230 #endif
00231   return 1 ;
00232 } /* nfs4_FhandleToFSAL */
00233 
00234 
00235 
00248 int nfs3_FhandleToFSAL( nfs_fh3 * pfh3, fsal_handle_t * pfsalhandle, fsal_op_context_t * pcontext ) 
00249 {
00250   fsal_status_t      fsal_status ;
00251   file_handle_v3_t * pfile_handle ;
00252   unsigned long long checksum ;
00253 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE  
00254   print_fhandle3( *pfh3 ) ;
00255 #endif
00256   /* Verify the len */
00257   if( pfh3->data.data_len !=  sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) )
00258     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00259 
00260   /* Cast the fh as a non opaque structure */
00261   pfile_handle = (file_handle_v3_t *)(pfh3->data.data_val) ;
00262 
00263 
00264   /* Check the cksum */
00265   memcpy( (char *)&checksum, pfile_handle->checksum, sizeof( checksum ) ) ;
00266   if( checksum != nfs3_FhandleCheckSum( pfile_handle ) )
00267   {
00268     DisplayLog( "Invalid checksum in NFSv3 handle. checksum from handle:%llX, expected:%llX", checksum, nfs3_FhandleCheckSum( pfile_handle ) );
00269     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00270   }
00271 
00272   /* Fill in the fs opaque part */
00273   fsal_status = FSAL_ExpandHandle( pcontext->export_context, FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV3, (caddr_t)&(pfile_handle->fsopaque), pfsalhandle ) ;
00274   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00275     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00276   
00277 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00278   print_buff( (char *)pfsalhandle, sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) ) ;
00279 #endif
00280   return 1 ;
00281 } /* nfs3_FhandleToFSAL */
00282 
00283 
00284 
00297 int nfs2_FhandleToFSAL( fhandle2 * pfh2, fsal_handle_t * pfsalhandle, fsal_op_context_t * pcontext ) 
00298 { 
00299   fsal_status_t      fsal_status ;
00300   file_handle_v2_t * pfile_handle ;
00301   
00302   /* Cast the fh as a non opaque structure */
00303   pfile_handle = (file_handle_v2_t *)pfh2 ;
00304 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00305   print_fhandle2( *pfh2 ) ;
00306 #endif
00307   /* Check the cksum */
00308   if( pfile_handle->checksum != nfs2_FhandleCheckSum( pfile_handle ) )
00309     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00310 
00311   /* Fill in the fs opaque part */
00312   fsal_status = FSAL_ExpandHandle( pcontext->export_context, FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV2, (caddr_t)&(pfile_handle->fsopaque), pfsalhandle ) ;
00313   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00314     return 0 ; /* Corrupted FH */
00315 
00316 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00317   print_buff( (char *)pfsalhandle, sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) ) ;
00318 #endif
00319   return 1 ;
00320 } /* nfs2_FhandleToFSAL */
00321 
00335 int nfs4_FSALToFhandle( nfs_fh4 * pfh4, fsal_handle_t * pfsalhandle, compound_data_t * data )
00336 {
00337   fsal_status_t     fsal_status ;
00338   file_handle_v4_t  file_handle ;
00339   unsigned long long cksum ;
00340   
00341   /* zero-ification of the buffer to be used as handle */
00342   memset( pfh4->nfs_fh4_val, 0, sizeof( file_handle_v4_t ) ) ; 
00343 
00344   /* Fill in the fs opaque part */
00345   fsal_status = FSAL_DigestHandle( &data->pexport->FS_export_context, FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV4, pfsalhandle, (caddr_t)&file_handle.fsopaque ) ;
00346   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00347     return 0 ;
00348 
00349   /* keep track of the export id */
00350   file_handle.exportid = data->pexport->id ;
00351 
00352   /* A very basic checksum */
00353   memset( (char *)&file_handle.checksum, 0, 16 ) ; /* NFS checksum is 16 bytes long */
00354   cksum =  nfs4_FhandleCheckSum( &file_handle ) ;
00355   memcpy( (char *)&file_handle.checksum, &cksum, sizeof( cksum ) ) ;
00356   
00357   /* No Pseudo fs here */
00358   file_handle.pseudofs_id = 0 ;
00359   file_handle.pseudofs_flag = FALSE ;
00360 
00361   /* if FH expires, set it there */
00362   if( nfs_param.nfsv4_param.fh_expire == TRUE )
00363    {
00364       printf( "Un fh expirable a ete cree\n" ) ;
00365       file_handle.srvboot_time  = ServerBootTime ;
00366    }    
00367   else
00368    {
00369       /* Non expirable FH */
00370       file_handle.srvboot_time  = 0 ;
00371    }
00372 
00373   /* Set the last byte */
00374   file_handle.xattr_pos = 0 ;
00375 
00376   /* Set the len */
00377   pfh4->nfs_fh4_len = sizeof( file_handle_v4_t ) ;
00378 
00379   /* Set the data */
00380   memcpy( pfh4->nfs_fh4_val, &file_handle, sizeof( file_handle_v4_t ) ) ;
00381  
00382   
00383   return 1 ;
00384 } /* nfs4_FSALToFhandle */
00385 
00386 
00400 int nfs3_FSALToFhandle( nfs_fh3 * pfh3, fsal_handle_t * pfsalhandle, exportlist_t * pexport ) 
00401 {
00402   fsal_status_t     fsal_status ;
00403   file_handle_v3_t  file_handle ;
00404   unsigned long long cksum ;
00405   
00406 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00407   print_buff( (char *)pfsalhandle, sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) ) ;
00408 #endif
00409   
00410   /* zero-ification of the buffer to be used as handle */
00411   memset( pfh3->data.data_val, 0, NFS3_FHSIZE ) ;
00412   memset( (caddr_t)&file_handle, 0, sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ));
00413   
00414   /* Fill in the fs opaque part */
00415   fsal_status = FSAL_DigestHandle( &pexport->FS_export_context, FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV3, pfsalhandle, (caddr_t)&file_handle.fsopaque ) ;
00416   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00417     return 0 ;
00418   
00419   /* keep track of the export id */
00420   file_handle.exportid = pexport->id ;
00421   
00422   /* Set the last byte */
00423   file_handle.xattr_pos = 0 ;
00424 
00425   /* A very basic checksum */
00426   memset( (char *)&file_handle.checksum, 0, 16 ) ; /* NFSv3 checksum is 16 bytes long */
00427   cksum =  nfs3_FhandleCheckSum( &file_handle ) ;
00428   memcpy( (char *)&file_handle.checksum, &cksum, sizeof( cksum ) ) ;
00429 
00430   /* Set the len */
00431   pfh3->data.data_len = sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00432   
00433   /* Set the data */
00434   memcpy( pfh3->data.data_val, &file_handle, sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ) ;
00435   
00436 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE  
00437   print_fhandle3( *pfh3 ) ;
00438 #endif
00439   
00440   return 1 ;
00441 } /* nfs3_FSALToFhandle */
00442 
00443 
00457 int nfs2_FSALToFhandle( fhandle2 * pfh2, fsal_handle_t * pfsalhandle, exportlist_t * pexport ) 
00458 {
00459   fsal_status_t    fsal_status ;
00460   file_handle_v2_t file_handle ;
00461   unsigned int     checksum ;
00462 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00463   print_buff( (char *)pfsalhandle, sizeof( fsal_handle_t ) ) ;
00464 #endif
00465   
00466   /* zero-ification of the buffer to be used as handle */
00467   memset( pfh2, 0, NFS2_FHSIZE ) ;
00468   
00469   /* Fill in the fs opaque part */
00470   fsal_status = FSAL_DigestHandle( &pexport->FS_export_context, FSAL_DIGEST_NFSV2, pfsalhandle, (caddr_t)&file_handle.fsopaque ) ;
00471   if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) )
00472     return 0 ;
00473 
00474    /* keep track of the export id */
00475   file_handle.exportid = pexport->id ;
00476   
00477   /* A very basic checksum */
00478   checksum =  nfs2_FhandleCheckSum( &file_handle ) ;
00479   memcpy( (char *)&file_handle.checksum, &checksum, sizeof( checksum ) ) ;
00480 
00481   /* Set the last byte */
00482   file_handle.xattr_pos = 0 ;
00483 
00484   /* Set the data */
00485   memcpy( (caddr_t)pfh2, &file_handle, sizeof( file_handle_v2_t ) ) ;
00486   
00487 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE
00488   print_fhandle2( *pfh2 ) ;
00489 #endif
00490   return 1 ;
00491 } /* nfs2_FSALToFhandle */

00505 short nfs4_FhandleToExportId( nfs_fh4 * pfh4 ) 
00506 {
00507   file_handle_v4_t * pfile_handle = NULL ;
00508   
00509   pfile_handle = (file_handle_v4_t *)(pfh4->nfs_fh4_val) ;
00510 
00511   if( pfile_handle == NULL )
00512         return -1 ; /* Badly formed arguments */
00513   
00514   return pfile_handle->exportid ;
00515 } /* nfs4_FhandleToExportId */

00529 short nfs3_FhandleToExportId( nfs_fh3 * pfh3 ) 
00530 {
00531   file_handle_v3_t * pfile_handle = NULL ;
00532 
00533   pfile_handle = (file_handle_v3_t *)(pfh3->data.data_val) ;
00534 
00535   if( pfile_handle == NULL ) 
00536         return -1 ;  /* Badly formed argument */
00537 
00538 #ifdef _DEBUG_FILEHANDLE  
00539   print_buff( (char *)pfh3->data.data_val, pfh3->data.data_len ) ;
00540 #endif 
00541   return pfile_handle->exportid ;
00542 } /* nfs3_FhandleToExportId */

00579 int nfs3_Is_Fh_Xattr( nfs_fh3 * pfh )
00580 {
00581   file_handle_v3_t * pfhandle3;
00582 
00583   if( pfh == NULL )
00584     return 0 ;
00585 
00586   pfhandle3 = (file_handle_v3_t *)(pfh->data.data_val) ;
00587 
00588   return (pfhandle3->xattr_pos != 0 )?1:0 ;
00589 } /* nfs4_Is_Fh_Xattr */
00590 
00602 int nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty( nfs_fh4 * pfh )
00603 {
00604   if( pfh == NULL )
00605     return NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00606   
00607   if( pfh->nfs_fh4_len == 0 )
00608     return NFS4ERR_NOFILEHANDLE ;
00609   
00610   return 0 ;
00611 } /* nfs4_Is_Fh_Empty */
00612 
00624 int nfs4_Is_Fh_Xattr( nfs_fh4 * pfh )
00625 {
00626   file_handle_v4_t * pfhandle4;
00627 
00628   if( pfh == NULL )
00629     return 0 ; 
00630  
00631   pfhandle4 = (file_handle_v4_t *)(pfh->nfs_fh4_val) ;
00632 
00633   return (pfhandle4->xattr_pos != 0 )?1:0 ;
00634 } /* nfs4_Is_Fh_Xattr */
00635 
00647 int nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo( nfs_fh4 * pfh )
00648 {
00649   file_handle_v4_t * pfhandle4;
00650 
00651   if( pfh == NULL )
00652     return 0 ; 
00653 
00654   pfhandle4 = (file_handle_v4_t *)(pfh->nfs_fh4_val) ;
00655   
00656   return  pfhandle4->pseudofs_flag ;
00657 } /* nfs4_Is_Fh_Pseudo */
00658 
00659 
00671 int nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired( nfs_fh4 * pfh )
00672 {
00673   file_handle_v4_t * pfilehandle4 ;
00674 
00675   if( pfh == NULL )
00676     return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00677  
00678   pfilehandle4 = (file_handle_v4_t *)pfh  ;
00679 
00680 
00681   if( ( nfs_param.nfsv4_param.fh_expire == TRUE )
00682         && ( pfilehandle4->srvboot_time != (unsigned int)ServerBootTime ) )
00683    {
00684     printf( "============================================================---> Un fh a expire\n" ) ;
00685     
00686     if( nfs_param.nfsv4_param.returns_err_fh_expired == TRUE )
00687         return NFS4ERR_FHEXPIRED ; 
00688    }
00689 
00690   return NFS4_OK ;
00691 } /* nfs4_Is_Fh_Expired */
00692 
00704 int nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid( nfs_fh4 * pfh )
00705 {
00706   if( pfh == NULL )
00707     return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00708 
00709   if( pfh->nfs_fh4_len > sizeof(file_handle_v4_t))
00710     return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00711 
00712   if( pfh->nfs_fh4_val == NULL )
00713     return NFS4ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00714 
00715   return NFS4_OK ;
00716 } /* nfs4_Is_Fh_Invalid */
00717 
00718 
00730 unsigned int nfs2_FhandleCheckSum( file_handle_v2_t * pfh )
00731 {
00732   unsigned int cksum ;
00733   
00734   cksum = (unsigned int)pfh->exportid + (unsigned int)pfh->fsopaque[1] + (unsigned int)pfh->fsopaque[3] + (unsigned int)pfh->fsopaque[5] ;
00735 
00736   return cksum ;
00737 } /* nfs2_FhandleCheckSum */
00738 
00750 unsigned long long nfs3_FhandleCheckSum( file_handle_v3_t * pfh )
00751 {
00752   unsigned long long cksum ;
00753   
00754   cksum = (unsigned long long)pfh->exportid + (unsigned long long)pfh->fsopaque[1] + (unsigned long long)pfh->fsopaque[3] + (unsigned long long)pfh->fsopaque[5] ;
00755 
00756   return cksum ;
00757 } /* nfs3_FhandleCheckSum */
00758 
00770 unsigned long long nfs4_FhandleCheckSum( file_handle_v4_t * pfh )
00771 {
00772   unsigned long long cksum ;
00773   
00774   cksum = (unsigned long long)pfh->exportid + (unsigned long long)pfh->fsopaque[1] + (unsigned long long)pfh->fsopaque[3] + (unsigned long long)pfh->fsopaque[5] ;
00775 
00776   return cksum ;
00777 } /* nfs4_FhandleCheckSum */

00779 
00791 void print_fhandle2( fhandle2 fh )
00792 {
00793   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00794 
00795   printf( "File Handle V2: " ) ;
00796   for( i = 0 ; i < 32 ; i++ )
00797     printf( "%02X", fh[i] );
00798   printf( "\n" ) ;
00799 } /* print_fhandle2 */
00800 
00801 void sprint_fhandle2( char * str, fhandle2 fh )
00802 {
00803   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00804 
00805   sprintf( str, "File Handle V2: " ) ;
00806   for( i = 0 ; i < 32 ; i++ )
00807     sprintf( str, "%02X", fh[i] );
00808 } /* sprint_fhandle2 */
00809 
00821 void print_fhandle3( nfs_fh3 fh )
00822 {
00823   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00824 
00825   printf( "  File Handle V3 : Len=%u ", fh.data.data_len ) ;
00826   for( i = 0 ; i < fh.data.data_len ; i++ )
00827     printf( "%02X", fh.data.data_val[i] );
00828   printf( "\n" ) ;
00829 } /* print_fhandle3 */
00830 
00831 void sprint_fhandle3( char * str, nfs_fh3 fh )
00832 {
00833   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00834 
00835   sprintf( str, "  File Handle V3 : Len=%u ", fh.data.data_len ) ;
00836   for( i = 0 ; i < fh.data.data_len ; i++ )
00837     sprintf( str, "%02X", fh.data.data_val[i] );
00838 } /* sprint_fhandle3 */

00840 
00852 void print_fhandle4( nfs_fh4 fh )
00853 {
00854   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00855 
00856   printf( "  File Handle V4 : Len=%u ", fh.nfs_fh4_len ) ;
00857   for( i = 0 ; i < fh.nfs_fh4_len ; i++ )
00858     printf( "%02X", fh.nfs_fh4_val[i] );
00859   printf( "\n" ) ;
00860 } /* print_fhandle4 */

00867   for( i = 0 ; i < fh.nfs_fh4_len ; i++ )
00868     sprintf( str, "%02X", fh.nfs_fh4_val[i] );

00885 {
00886   int i = 0 ;
00887   
00888   printf( "  Len=%u Buff=%p Val: ", len, buff ) ;
00889   for( i = 0 ; i < len ; i++ )
00890     printf( "%02X", buff[i] ) ;
00891   printf( "\n" ) ;

00914 void print_compound_fh( compound_data_t * data )
00915 {
00916   printf( "Current FH  " ) ;
00917   print_fhandle4( data->currentFH ) ;
00918 
00919   printf( "Saved FH    " ) ;
00920   print_fhandle4( data->savedFH ) ;
00921 
00922   printf( "Public FH   " ) ;
00923   print_fhandle4( data->publicFH ) ;
00924 
00925   printf( "Root FH     " ) ;
00926   print_fhandle4( data->rootFH ) ;
00927 } /* print_compoud_fh */

00943 void nfs4_sprint_fhandle( nfs_fh4 * fh4p, char * outstr )
00944 {
00945   unsigned int i = 0 ;
00946   char         tmpstr[LEN_FH_STR] ;
00947 
00948   sprintf( outstr, "File handle V4 = { Length = %d  Val = ", fh4p->nfs_fh4_len) ;
00949 
00950   for( i = 0 ; i < fh4p->nfs_fh4_len ; i++ )
00951     {
00952       sprintf(  &(tmpstr[i*2]), "%02X", (unsigned char)fh4p->nfs_fh4_val[i] );
00953     }
00954 
00955   sprintf( outstr, "File handle V4 = { Length = %d  Val = %s }", fh4p->nfs_fh4_len, tmpstr) ;
00956 
00957 } /* nfs4_sprint_fhandle */
